settings.caption: Everything we do is filtered through
settings.heading: 45+ years of experience and 100,000+ patient visits
settings.text:
Our supplements were formulated for our patients in our clinic. Real people with real symptoms. our formulas had to work. otherwise, it would make for some uncomfortable follow-up visits.

Each ingredient in all of our formulas was chosen for one reason — to help you overcome your symptoms and feel fantastic again.

settings.heading: The horrifying mess inside your intestines
settings.text:
If you think all bacteria are harmful to you…think again! the vast majority of them are actually good for you!

A healthy gut is the warm, wet, cozy home for more than 80 trillion bacteria. they outnumber our own cells.

Roughly 85% of the bacteria in our guts are good for us — if we've got a healthy gut.

And… that's the catch.

Because…

Your gut can be a nasty swamp.

One researcher performed lab tests on more than 500 people. he found the bacteria in their guts were 85% bad and 15% good…

Exactly the reverse of what it should be.

The way we live today… we've wiped out our friendly bacteria and allowed harmful microbes to take over.

For example...

The New York Post recently published this shocking article:

"You're eating a credit card's worth of plastic a week... and it's killing your gut. "

Humans eat 5 grams of small plastics particles every week…which is the weight of a credit card.

These tiny plastics can change your gut bacteria composition…
Wreaking havoc on your gut.
But it gets worse.

According to the researchers…

The plastic particles you're eating cause an immune response and activate inflammation…
And they "trigger chemical pathways involved in the formation of cancer."
according to the study, the health effects of plastic…

"May be irreversible."

settings.heading: Luckily, you can put things right with probiotics.

settings.text:
Probiotics are the fancy word for friendly bacteria. it means "pro-life."
and…
Probiotics help you digest your food, boost your immune system, and control yeast and harmful bacteria (like those that cause excessive gas and ulcers).
I want you to know probiotics do so much more than keep your gut healthy.
They Keep Your Whole Body Healthy.

As i said earlier, your gut contains over 80 trillion bacteria.
But…so do your lungs, skin, heart, joints….and brain.
And, it turns out…
There's communication going on between the bacteria in your gut and the bacteria in your lungs, brain, skin, joints, heart, and liver…
(researchers call it crosstalk)
meaning…
Whatever affects the bacteria in your gut…
Also affects the bacteria everywhere else in your body.

settings.heading: It's time to Put Back the healthy intestinal bacteria modern life takes out with Daily Probiotics

settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.heading: The truth is "most" Probiotics will fail you

settings.text:
Most companies don’t take the time to understand what most people need in a probiotic.

But i can’t blame them, most of them are not doctors so they could never understand what is truly needed in a probiotic supplement.

We work with thousands of patients inside and outside of our clinic every day so we see what works first hand.

And that’s why i’d like to share with you...

settings.caption: Secret #1:
settings.heading: The Right Strains
settings.text:
Researchers don't just grab the nearest probiotic supplement off the supermarket shelf and hope they work. and neither should you!

When researchers use probiotics they use ones that are effective for specific health issues.

There are literally thousands of strains of probiotics and they all have a roll to play.

Take a strain like lactobacillus for example. this strain is most active in the small intestine, while others are active in the large intestine and support colon health.

Combining both supports your entire intestinal tract.

So you can see how putting the right ones together gives you a complete network of protection.

Some specifically target inflammation and can help with pain and discomfort in your joints.

Others are strictly to promote digestive health and can aid in reducing problems like leaky gut syndrome.

And many more focus on things like sleep, gut health, skin health and a wide variety of health issues.

Which brings me to…

settings.caption: Secret #2:
settings.heading: The Right Amount
settings.text:
Remember - there’s a battle going on inside of your gut, and having the highest number of soldiers (good bacteria) in the fight is going to help you stay healthy.

But how much is enough?

You might see some probiotics that say 1.5 billion cfu (number of probiotics) and that does sound like a lot right?

Well you should know that 1.5 billion cfu is like a raindrop in the ocean.

Most research studies are done with at least 25 billion cfu’s

And in my 3 decades of experience treating patients with digestive and inflammation issues…

Many people, especially older adults, benefit most from an “extra strength” daily dose of 50 billion cfus

Sounds like a lot right?

But when you consider that bacteria outnumbers your human cells 10 to 1, it starts to make sense why you need so many.

settings.caption: Secret #3:
settings.heading: The Right Quality
settings.text:
Scientists use the highest-quality probiotics they can and you should too.

Using poor-quality strains doesn't make sense to a researcher because they’re looking for results.

But it makes a lot of sense to many probiotic companies because they’re looking for profits.

That means that most probiotics on the market are actually of low quality probiotics.

And when you have low quality probiotics in your system, it’s like sending in reserve troops to vietnam with only a week of training.

You might think that higher quality means higher costs…

But I’m about to show you right now that’s not the case!

settings.text:

I’m proud to introduce our…

settings.heading: Each capsule of probiotic complex is packed with a full 50 Billion Probiotics

settings.text:
The #1 probiotic food in the supermarket is yogurt.

You’ve likely seen the commercials praising yogurt as the new “probiotic wonderkid” that can do everything from help you lose weight to feel younger.

The good news is that probiotics can do this for you…

The bad news is that yogurt can't.

Yogurt and other foods have a shockingly low cfu count which means they’re really low on the important probiotics.

How low?

To match what’s inside our probiotic complex you would need to eat 16,000 4oz yogurts.

And that’s just to match 1 capsule!
